translation.en: [narrator] In the beginning, the great Frith made the world
translation.ko: 태초에 위대한 프리스 님이 세상을 만들고

translation.en: and he made the stars by scattering his droppings over the sky.
translation.ko: 자기 똥을 하늘에 흩뿌려 별을 만들었다

translation.en: Now, El-Ahrairah was prince of the rabbits and he had so many wives and so many kits
translation.ko: 토끼 족의 왕자 엘-아흐레라는 아내와 새끼들이 얼마나 많았던지

translation.en: that even Frith couldn't count them.
translation.ko: 프리스 님조차 셀 수 없을 정도였다

translation.en: They ate all the grass and clover in the entire world.
translation.ko: 토끼들은 전 세계의 풀과 클로버를 모두 뜯어 먹었다

translation.en: Frith could have killed the prince rabbit there and then,
translation.ko: 프리스 님은 토끼 왕자를 즉시 죽일 수도 있었지만

translation.en: but he needed him for his hijinks and tricks.
translation.ko: 왕자를 살려 두고 재주 부리는 걸 즐기기로 했다

translation.en: So, instead, he determined there would be a meeting
translation.ko: 그래서 프리스 님은 세계의 모든 동물을

translation.en: of all the animals of the world, and upon each, he would bestow a gift.
translation.ko: 한데 모아 각 동물에게 선물을 주기로 했다

translation.en: Upon the homba, he gave great cunning.
Upon the hawk, sharp talons.
Upon the cat, silent feet.
Upon the weasel, great speed.
Upon the wolf, great teeth. All to hunt and slay the children of El-Ahrairah.
translation.ko: 늑대에겐 날카로운 이빨을 줬는데 모두 엘-아흐레라의 자손을 잡아 죽이게 하려는 거였다

translation.en: These animals became the elil, the thousand enemies of rabbits.
translation.ko: 이 동물들은 엘릴 즉, 토끼의 천의 적이 됐다

translation.en: It was a few days later, when El-Ahrairah heard of all of this,
translation.ko: 며칠 후 엘-아흐레라가 이 모든 얘기를 듣고

translation.en: and went to see Frith.
[El-Ahrairah] You have condemned my people to lives of fear, Lord.
translation.ko: 프리스 님은 제 부족에게 두려움에 떠는 삶을 내리셨습니다

translation.en: [Frith] Do you not wish to see what blessing I have for your people, Prince Rabbit?
translation.ko: 내가 토끼 족을 위해 어떤 선물을 준비했는지 보고 싶지 않은가?

translation.en: [El-Ahrairah] To my bottom, give your blessings.
[Frith] Very well.
Grow a tail to confuse those chasing you and legs to outrun them.
translation.ko: 그대를 쫓는 적을 교란하는 꼬리와 적보다 빨리 달리는 다리

translation.en: Grow ears to hear any of your thousand enemies from miles away.
translation.ko: 몇 km 밖에서도 천의 적 소리를 듣는 귀를 주겠다

translation.en: All the world will be your enemy, prince of a thousand enemies.
translation.ko: 온 세상이 그대의 적이 될 것이다 천의 적을 가진 왕자여

translation.en: And when they catch you, they will kill you.
But first... they must catch you.
Digger, listener, runner...
translation.ko: 굴 파기의 달인이자 귀가 예민한 발 빠르고 눈치 빠른 왕자여

translation.en: Prince with the swift warning, be cunning and full of tricks...
translation.ko: 굴 파기의 달인이자 귀가 예민한 발 빠르고 눈치 빠른 왕자여 약삭빠르고 재주 많은 자가 되어라

translation.en: and your people will never be destroyed.
[Hazel] Fiver!
Fiver!
Fiver, where are you?
translation.ko: - 파이버, 어디에 있는 거야? - 뭐가 그렇게 급하니?

translation.en: -[laughter] -[rabbit 1] I'm going to get you! [rabbit 2] Got you!
-[Hazel] Hello, little ones. -[rabbits] Hi, Hazel.
translation.ko: - 안녕, 꼬맹이들? - 안녕, 헤이즐? - 안녕! - 안녕, 헤이즐?

translation.en: Do you think there'll be a lot of does out this evening?
Is that all you think about, Hawkbit?
No, actually, but do you think there'll be lots of does out this evening?
translation.ko: 아니야, 그런데 오늘 저녁에 암토끼들이 많이 나오긴 할까?

translation.en: -[Dandelion] Give it a rest. -[Hawkbit] I was just asking.
translation.ko: - 그만 좀 해 - 그냥 물어본 거야

translation.en: It's not all I think about, actually. There's lots of things I think about...
translation.ko: 그것만 생각하는 게 아니라고 내가 생각하는 게 얼마나 많은데

translation.en: Fiver?
Fiver?
[Blackberry] The duration of each season has to be calculated by light values.
translation.ko: 각 계절의 정확한 기간은 밝기로 계산해야 해

translation.en: -[Bluebell] I've stopped listening. -[Blackberry] I don't know why I bother.
translation.ko: - 아까부터 안 듣는 거 알지? - 내가 왜 애쓰나 몰라

translation.en: [Bluebell] Nope, but I did see...
Fiver?
[Hazel] Fiver?
[Fiver] Oh, no. No. No.
-[distant rumbling] -[Hazel] Fiver?
-[Hazel] Wake up, Fiver. -[gasps and breathes heavily]
You're having another nightmare, brother.
[pants] Hazel, it was the strangest dream.
translation.ko: 헤이즐 - 이렇게 이상한 꿈은 처음이야 - 괜찮아, 파이버

translation.en: It's okay, Fiver. Let's go get something to eat.
translation.ko: - 이렇게 이상한 꿈은 처음이야 - 괜찮아, 파이버 나가서 먹을 것 좀 찾자

translation.en: I spotted some sow thistle down by the stream,
translation.ko: 개울 옆에 방가지똥이 있는 걸 봤거든

translation.en: and I haven't eaten anything decent in days.
translation.ko: 난 며칠간 제대로 된 음식을 못 먹었다고

translation.en: I... I dreamt something was coming to Sandleford.
I think it might mean we're in danger, Hazel.
Captain Holly was in it. There was a huge--
Captain Holly? Fiver, I think Captain Holly can take care of himself.
translation.ko: 홀리 대장? 홀리 대장은 혼자서도 앞가림 잘할 거야

translation.en: They usually do in the Owsla.
I know, and no one likes hearing about someone else's dreams, but...
translation.ko: 나도 다른 토끼 꿈에 귀 기울이는 토끼가 없는 거 알아

translation.en: [Hazel] Huh. Dewdrop.
-I dreamt something was coming. -[does giggle]
-My dream was about Captain Holly. -It's him again. [giggles]
-[whispers] Is he still looking? -Hazel.
-Don't look at him. -Do you like him?
[chuckles] Oh, look, Fiver, sow thistle! Finally, something good to eat.
translation.ko: 저것 봐, 방가지똥이야 드디어 먹을 만한 게 있네

translation.en: [Scabious] Oi, you two. You know the rules.
Sow thistle is reserved for members of the Owsla, don't you know that?
translation.ko: 방가지똥은 아우슬라 일원을 위해 남겨둔 거야, 몰라?

translation.en: -Move along. -[they cackle]
"You know the rules." I'm sick of the rules.
translation.ko: 규칙을 아느냐고? 규칙 같은 거 지긋지긋해

translation.en: I wonder whether there's a place for us in this warren!
translation.ko: 이 토끼 마을에 우리를 위한 곳이 있을까?

translation.en: There's too many rabbits and too little food without the Owsla stealing from us--
translation.ko: 아우슬라가 빼앗지 않아도 음식은 적고 토끼는 너무 많지

translation.en: This is where it comes from... the thing in my dream.
translation.ko: 바로 여기가 내 꿈에 나왔던 곳이야

translation.en: [breathes heavily] Look!
The fields are filled with blood.
It's only the light of sunset, Fiver.
Brother, I know everyone thinks I'm strange.
Even you sometimes, but you have to believe me.
translation.ko: 가끔은 형도 그렇게 생각하지만 날 믿어야 해

translation.en: Something will come to this place... something foul and fierce.
translation.ko: 역겹고 험악한 무언가가 이곳으로 올 거야

translation.en: -We need to warn everyone. -But we're outskirters, Fiver.
translation.ko: - 모두에게 경고해야 해 - 하지만 우린 변두리 출신이야

translation.en: People don't listen to us.
Well, we must make them listen.
How do you propose we do that?
Go away. He's busy.
We only need a few moments with the Threarah.
We wouldn't ask if it weren't important.
All right, go on.
But if I get my head bitten off, I'll come looking for you.
translation.ko: 하지만 족장님이 화내면 가만히 안 둘 줄 알아

translation.en: [Threarah] So, you were saying, your brother senses things.
Uh, yes. Sometimes images in his head.
And... [sighs] I don't know how to say it, but he was right before.
translation.ko: 어떻게 말해야 할지 모르겠지만 전에도 예언이 맞았었죠

translation.en: -He knew the flood was coming last autumn. -Oh, I see.
translation.ko: 지난가을에 홍수가 올 것도 예언했어요 그렇군

translation.en: And what has he, um, sensed this time? [munches]
I don't know what it is, but it's bad.
translation.ko: 뭔지 모르겠지만 나쁜 거예요 무척 불길해요

translation.en: It's so bad. You have to get everyone to leave tonight, Threarah, please.
translation.ko: 뭔지 모르겠지만 나쁜 거예요 무척 불길해요 오늘 밤에 모두 떠나야 합니다 쓰레아라 님

translation.en: My goodness. Everyone? Tonight?
[chuckles] The entire warren, and you want me to tell them that we all have to go?
translation.ko: 이 마을의 모든 토끼에게 떠나야 한다고 말하라는 거야?

translation.en: Well, I'll give that some very serious thought.
You're not listening. There is no time.
translation.ko: 제 말을 안 들으시는군요 시간이 없어요

translation.en: I can feel the danger like a wire around my neck!
translation.ko: 철사 덫이 제 목을 조이는 것처럼 위험이 느껴져요

translation.en: Threarah, you have to act now... Now! [echoes]
translation.ko: 쓰레아라 님 행동으로 옮기셔야 해요, 당장요!

translation.en: Bigwig!
Hazel, I think your brother needs to rest for a while.
translation.ko: 헤이즐, 자네 동생은 좀 쉬어야 할 것 같군

translation.en: Take him out for some fresh air.
-No, but... -Shh. Yes, Threarah.
[Threarah] I told you I wanted to be left alone, fool!
translation.ko: 방해받고 싶지 않다고 했잖아 이 멍청한 놈!

translation.en: And you let a bunch of outskirters...
Hazel... Hazel. That was our answer.
We have to go.
Are you really sure, Fiver?
I'm telling you now as your brother, as your friend...
this warren will soon be laid waste.
We can leave now, or we can be destroyed with it.
translation.ko: 지금 떠나지 않으면 우리도 마을과 함께 사라져

translation.en: We need to spread the word to as many rabbits as possible, but be careful.
translation.ko: 가능한 한 많은 토끼에게 말을 퍼뜨려야 해 하지만 조심해

translation.en: If the Owsla get wind of this, there will be trouble.
Bluebell, Blackberry, there's a danger coming.
Hey, listen. There's a danger coming to Sandleford. Hazel will lead us to safety.
translation.ko: 잘 들어 샌들포드에 위험이 다가오고 있어 형이 안전한 곳으로 안내할 거야 프리스 다운에 다리 밑에서 만나

translation.en: Join us at Frith Down under the bridge.
translation.ko: 형이 안전한 곳으로 안내할 거야 프리스 다운에 다리 밑에서 만나

translation.en: Good heavens. I mean, good gracious. I mean, that is to say...
Hazel, if your brother has taken firm stock in such a portent--
translation.ko: 헤이즐, 네 동생이 그 징후가 맞다고 확신한다면

translation.en: What Blackberry's trying to say is, we're in!
Hey, there's a danger coming to Sandleford.
Hazel will lead us to safety.
Join us at Frith Down, under the bridge.
What was all that about?
But I don't understand.
-Sandleford is our home, Hazel. -Look, there's a danger coming.
translation.ko: - 샌들포드는 우리의 집이야 - 위험이 오고 있어

translation.en: My brother sensed it. He's often right about these things.
translation.ko: 내 동생이 느꼈다고 동생 예언은 맞을 때가 많아

translation.en: What if it's more dangerous out there than here?
We're meeting at Fu Inle, by the cattle grid.
translation.ko: 푸 인레에 캐틀 그리드 옆에서 만날 거야

translation.en: Come with us.
Come with me.
Let me think about it, okay?
Dewdrop? Dewdrop?
It's Blackberry and Bluebell, and we've brought Hawkbit and Dandelion, too.
-Get down here before you're seen! -Right you are.
Wait, wait, wait, this everyone?
Where are the does? I presumed there'd be does.
[sighs] This can't be everyone. It can't be.
Maybe we should go back, convince the others.
translation.ko: 돌아가서 다른 토끼들을 설득하는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: -[Fiver] She's not coming, Hazel. -[small clang and all gasp]
There's been more and more of those strange things recently.
-They come from humans. -[Blackberry] Fascinating.
All right. Let's go.
Not so fast!
Owsla.
You're all under arrest for spreading dissension and inciting to mutiny.
translation.ko: 갈등을 부추기고 반란을 조장한 혐의로 모두 체포한다!

translation.en: You more than anyone need to listen, Captain Holly.
translation.ko: 다른 누구보다 귀를 기울여야지, 홀리 대장

translation.en: Something is coming to this place, something foul and fierce.
translation.ko: 뭔가 이곳으로 오고 있어 역겹고 험악한 무언가가

translation.en: Just let us go.
Even if you are bigger, there are more of us.
translation.ko: 대장이 덩치는 커도 우리가 수적으로 우세해

translation.en: We fancy it'd be a good fight.
The Threarah nearly tore my ears off tonight after I'd let you in.
translation.ko: 너희를 들여보냈다고 쓰레아라 님한테 귀를 뜯길 뻔했어

translation.en: Told me I'm lucky I'm not kicked out of the Owsla!
Lucky to still have my privileges. Well...
translation.ko: 특권을 잃지 않은 걸 다행으로 알라고까지 했어!

translation.en: -Well, I'm sick of being in the Owsla. -Thlayli!
I'm sick of being in this warren!
I'm sick of obeying your orders and towing the line!
translation.ko: 대장 명령을 따르고 시키는 대로 하는 것도!

translation.en: Thlayli, be careful, now. Think about what you're doing.
translation.ko: 쓸라일리, 조심해 네가 무슨 짓을 하는지 생각해 봐

translation.en: Go now, Captain Holly, or we'll kill the lot of you.
translation.ko: 당장 꺼져, 홀리 대장 아니면 완전히 죽여 줄 테니까

translation.en: Someone told them what you're up to.
We need to move before they come back with the entire Owsla.
translation.ko: 모든 아우슬라를 끌고 돌아오기 전에 떠나야 해

translation.en: Along the line of the stream and through the meadow, then into the woods. Come on!
translation.ko: 개울을 따라가다 목초지를 지나서 숲으로 갈 거야, 가자!

translation.en: [Bluebell] Do you think this is where the black rabbit of Inle lives?
translation.ko: 여기가 인레의 블랙 래빗이 사는 곳일까?

translation.en: In a stone warren of dead rabbits, filled with disease and death?
translation.ko: 병과 죽음이 가득한 죽은 토끼들이 있는 돌로 된 마을?

translation.en: [Blackberry] Please stop talking.
[Bluebell] With black eyes that burn like the fires of hell
translation.ko: 그 토끼는 지옥의 불길처럼 타는 검은 눈을 가졌고

translation.en: and a cold, grey expression, with sorrow beyond imagining.
translation.ko: 회색빛의 차가운 표정은 상상도 못 할 슬픔이 가득해

translation.en: Bluebell, you're making everyone nervous.
translation.ko: 블루벨, 네 얘기 때문에 다들 불안해하잖아

translation.en: Hazel, this was your plan. Where are we going?
translation.ko: 헤이즐, 네 계획이었잖아 어디로 가는 거지?

translation.en: We need to get clear of the old warren, then I guess we'll find somewhere to stay.
translation.ko: 예전 마을에서 벗어나면 - 머물 곳이 나올 것 같아 - '나올 것 같아'?

translation.en: You guess? He guesses. Who's leader here, anyway?
translation.ko: - 머물 곳이 나올 것 같아 - '나올 것 같아'? 헤이즐도 추측일 뿐이야 우리 리더는 누구지?

translation.en: No one by the looks of it. -[Holly] They're up ahead! -[gasping]
-Owsla. -Everyone run!
[rabbit] Get them!
Quick, go! Come on!
-They're getting away! -Close them down!
This is a nice surprise, Hazel!
I say we go deeper into the trees and hide.
-No. We have to cross the river here. -Cross it? Maybe some of us could,
translation.ko: - 이 강을 건너야 해 - 강을 건너? 다 건너지는 못할 거야 너랑 블루벨은 지쳤잖아

translation.en: but you and Bluebell are worn out.
translation.ko: 다 건너지는 못할 거야 너랑 블루벨은 지쳤잖아

translation.en: If Fiver says we cross here, we cross here.
[Owsla 1] They're here. I see 'em!
-[Bluebell] Faster. Faster! -[Owsla 2] Get 'em!
We'll never outrun them now. We're done for.
translation.ko: 잡히고 말 거야 - 우린 끝났어 - 어서 가! 잡으라고

translation.en: [Owsla 2] Go on! Get 'em!
-Faster! -[Owsla 3] They're getting away!
-[Bluebell] Faster, they're catching up! -[Hazel] Blackberry, any suggestions?
translation.ko: - 따라온다, 더 빨리 가! - 블랙베리, 좋은 생각 없어?

translation.en: I had a rather splendid idea, but the blasted thing disappeared again.
translation.ko: 끝내주는 생각이 있었는데 그 빌어먹을 게 또 사라졌어

translation.en: About... uh, about the strange things that Fiver and I saw,
translation.ko: 그거... 파이버와 내가 본 그 이상한 물건 말이야

translation.en: the human things that move on top of the river, on top of the...
translation.ko: 그 인간 물건이 강에 떠서 움직였잖아

translation.en: It's... It's... It was...
There!
-Everybody follow me! -[panting]
[Owsla 2] Where're they going?
-Here! Quick. Get on this thing. -[grunting]
translation.ko: - 서둘러! 이 위에 올라가 - 다들 올라타!

translation.en: [rabbit] What's going on? -[Blackberry] Push it into the water. -[grunting]
translation.ko: - 어떻게 되는 거야? - 너희 둘이 강으로 밀어

translation.en: Push!
-[Owsla 1] Quick! -[yelling]
-[Blackberry] Hold on with your paws. -What are they doing?
translation.ko: 앞발로 잡아 - 뭘 하는 거지? - 어떻게 된 거야?

translation.en: [rabbit] Go upstream!
-[Holly] This way! -[Owsla 1] Come on, lads. Faster.
-[grunts] -[Holly] Try and find a way across.
-[yelling] -[Owsla] Quick! Get 'em!
Get 'em.
-[Holly] Cut them off! -[Owsla 1] Come on, Toadflax!
-Come on! -[grunting]
-[Owsla 1] Come on! -They're getting away!
[Blackberry] Kick! Kick! Kick!
-Keep kicking! -[Holly] Go, go, go, go!
-[grunting] -Come on!
I'll see you again, Bigwig! I promise you that!
translation.ko: 우린 또 만날 거다, 빅윅! 약속하지!

translation.en: And next time, there won't be a river between us!
translation.ko: 다음에는 우리 사이에 강이 없을 거야

translation.en: Oh, I'm counting on it. [chuckles]
[Bluebell] Everybody listen up! Now that I'm official storyteller...
translation.ko: 다들 잘 들어 이제 내가 공식적인 이야기꾼이야

translation.en: I've decided I am the official storyteller of the group, by the way.
translation.ko: 내가 그렇게 정했어 난 우리의 이야기꾼이야

translation.en: I'll have to make it into a legendary tale.
translation.ko: 그러니 이 일을 전설로 만들어야 해

translation.en: "The Story of How Hazel Led Our Escape Over the Raging Rapids."
translation.ko: '격렬한 급류를 지나 헤이즐이 탈출을 이끈 이야기'

translation.en: It was Blackberry who had the idea.
[Bluebell] But you stayed calm and led us on our way.
I tell you, he is what I call a Chief Rabbit. Hazel-rah!
translation.ko: 헤이즐은 족장 토끼야 - '헤이즐-라'지 - 헤이즐-라? 족장 토끼?

translation.en: Hazel-rah! Chief Rabbit! [chuckles]
Frith in a wasps' nest!
The day I call you Chief Rabbit, Hazel, that'll be the day.
translation.ko: 내가 널 족장 토끼라고 부르는 날은... 그럴 일은 절대 없지만 그날 싸움을 멈추지

translation.en: I'll stop fighting that day, and all.
translation.ko: 그럴 일은 절대 없지만 그날 싸움을 멈추지

translation.en: [Hawkbit] I know we have to find a new home,
translation.ko: 새로 머물 곳을 찾아야 하는 건 알지만

translation.en: but we're like sitting ducks out here in the open.
translation.ko: 이렇게 탁 트인 곳은 무방비 상태인데

translation.en: And why does it have to be so far away?
translation.ko: 왜 멀리까지 가서 보금자리를 찾아야 해?

translation.en: -I guess because Fiver says. -"Because Fiver says."
translation.ko: - 파이버가 한 말 때문이겠지 - '파이버가 한 말 때문'이라니

translation.en: Fiver says a lot of things. What if Fiver says jump out of a bush and tickle a wolf?
translation.ko: 파이버가 하는 말이 좀 많아? 파이버가 덤불에서 뛰어나가 늑대를 간지럽히라면?

translation.en: "Because Fiver says!" Hazel's no fool, Hawkbit.
translation.ko: - 웃기지도 않아 - 헤이즐은 바보가 아니야, 호크빗

translation.en: He knows we need to take Fiver with a pinch of salt now and then.
translation.ko: 가끔은 파이버 얘기를 의심해야 한다는 것도 알아

translation.en: -[Hazel] What was that? -Up ahead. Through the hedge.
What is it?
Doesn't smell natural.
It's a road. Have you never seen one before or something?
translation.ko: - 자연의 냄새가 아닌데 - 길이야 전에 본 적 없어?

translation.en: Don't know much about things, do you, Hazel-rah?
Why don't you teach me, Bigwig?
translation.ko: 네가 가르쳐 주는 게 어때, 빅윅?

translation.en: [sighs] The men put the black stuff there, so that the hrududil can run on it.
translation.ko: 사람들이 검은 걸 발라 놔서 흐루두딜이 여길 달릴 수 있어

translation.en: They're harmless, so long as you leave them alone by night.
translation.ko: 흐루두딜은 해를 끼치지 않아 밤에만 안 만나면 말이지

translation.en: See that? They don't hurt you.
As a matter of fact, I don't think they're alive.
translation.ko: 사실 흐루두딜은 살아 있는 게 아닌 것 같아

translation.en: You say they're not dangerous, Bigwig, but look at that.
translation.ko: 넌 위험하지 않다고 했지만 저것 좀 봐

translation.en: A yona... Why would it kill a yona?
Yonil hunt at night. That's what I'm trying to say to you.
translation.ko: 요나는 밤에 사냥하잖아 저걸 얘기하려던 거야

translation.en: In the dark, the hrududil have big lights and they draw creatures close.
translation.ko: 어둠 속에서는 흐루두딜에게서 큰 빛이 나오는데 그걸로 동물들을 유인해

translation.en: And if they shine on you, you go tharn...
and then they crush you.
You let me know if you want me to teach you anything else, Hazel.
translation.ko: 또 알고 싶은 게 있으면 물어봐

translation.en: We have to keep moving.
There's too many elil at night to stay still without a warren.
translation.ko: 굴도 없는데 멈출 수 없어 밤에는 엘릴이 너무 많아

translation.en: Come on!
[Hazel] Fiver!
What is it?
There, that's where we're going.
That down.
That's our home.
We head for the down.
-[Hawkbit] Where are we going to sleep? -[Bluebell] Yeah, where?
translation.ko: - 잠은 어디서 자, 헤이즐? - 그러게, 어디서 자?

translation.en: [Hawkbit] There'll be more elil out soon. It's far too late to dig scrapes.
translation.ko: 곧 엘릴이 더 많아질 텐데 굴을 파기엔 너무 늦었어

translation.en: Shh.
-[Fiver] Bigwig! I thought-- -Quiet, Fiver. Something's here.
translation.ko: - 빅윅! - 조용해, 파이버 - 내 생각엔 뭔가... - 뭔가 있어

translation.en: -[Bigwig] What is it? -Maybe it's the black rabbit of Inle.
translation.ko: 뭐지? - 인레의 블랙 래빗일지도 - 말도 안 돼, 그런 건 없어

translation.en: Nonsense. There's no such thing.
translation.ko: - 인레의 블랙 래빗일지도 - 말도 안 돼, 그런 건 없어

translation.en: -Wake up now. -[Hazel] Bigwig. What's going on?
translation.ko: - 일어나 - 무슨 일이야? 빅윅, 왜 그래?

translation.en: Corvil! A reckoning of them!
translation.ko: - 코르빌즈! 저들일 줄 알았어 - 무슨 일이야?

translation.en: We should run.
-Let me try and talk to them. -Talk to them? Hazel, no!
translation.ko: - 내가 얘기해 볼게 - 얘기? 헤이즐, 안 돼

translation.en: We understand that this might be your home.
We are only here because we've got nowhere else to go. [grunts]
translation.ko: 우린 갈 곳이 없어서 여기 있는 것뿐이야

translation.en: -[cawing] -[yells]
-[squawks] -Get him off me! [groans]
Someone should draw them away, give the rest of us a chance.
translation.ko: 누가 쟤들 좀 유인해! 그래야 나머지가 살지

translation.en: Are you mad? You'll never outrun a corva!
I'll go.
He's serious.
-[cawing] -[Blackberry] That is one fast rabbit.
[Hazel] He's got 'em distracted. Let's go!
There he is. No! Dandelion! Put him down!
translation.ko: 저기 있다! 안 돼! 댄디라이온! 내 친구 내려놔!

translation.en: [Hawkbit] Run, Dandelion, run!
One step closer and I'll pull your tail feathers out
translation.ko: 한 발자국만 더 다가오면 네 꽁지깃을 뽑아서

translation.en: and stuff them down your throat, you embleer corva!
translation.ko: 목에 박아 줄 테다 이 엠블리어 코르바!

translation.en: [Bigwig] All right, day's breaking, we should stop.
translation.ko: 좋아, 날이 밝아 온다 멈춰야 해

translation.en: [Hazel] No. We keep moving.
Are you giving me an order, Hazel?
Because I didn't realise anyone had made you Chief Rabbit!
translation.ko: 누가 널 족장 토끼로 만든 줄은 몰랐는걸

translation.en: After all, it was me who helped us escape Sandleford.
Blackberry who rescued us at the stream.
Oh, and Dandelion who saved us from your stupid mistake with the birds!
translation.ko: 새들과 대화한 네 멍청한 실수에서 우릴 구한 건 댄디라이온이고!

translation.en: We followed you here,
because you promised us a better life, Hazel, a better life!
translation.ko: 네가 더 나은 삶을 약속했기 때문이야!

translation.en: [sighs] Things will improve when we reach the down.
translation.ko: 워터십 다운까지 가면 상황이 나아질 거야

translation.en: [guffaws] Yes, yes! The down.
The place we're heading for no reason other than Fiver had a feeling about it!
translation.ko: 파이버의 느낌 하나만 믿고 가고 있는 곳이지

translation.en: Well, as there's no does here, I'm going to attempt to dig myself a scrape.
translation.ko: 여긴 암컷이 없으니 내가 직접 굴을 팔 거야

translation.en: Is that okay? Not because I want to rest, but because this is where I'm staying!
translation.ko: 괜찮겠지? 쉬려는 게 아니라 여기서 머물 거야

translation.en: Bigwig was right. I'm not a leader.
translation.ko: 빅윅 말이 맞아 난 리더가 아니야

translation.en: I'm not strong like him.
I'm not smart like Blackberry.
I'm not fast like Dandelion.
And I don't have stories to lift everyone's spirits like Bluebell.
translation.ko: 블루벨처럼 이야기로 기운을 북돋아 주지도 못하지

translation.en: Or visions to keep us from harm like you.
translation.ko: 나쁜 일을 피하게 해주는 너 같은 예지력도 없고

translation.en: You've led us this far, and none of us are dead.
translation.ko: 형은 여기까지 우릴 이끌었고 다들 무사하잖아

translation.en: -Isn't that a miracle in itself? -It's blind luck is what it is.
translation.ko: - 그 자체가 기적 아니야? - 순전히 운이야

translation.en: -[distant thunder] -We could use another dose of that now.
What on earth is that rabbit doing?
translation.ko: 저 토끼가 도대체 뭘 하는 거지?

translation.en: Who are you, and what do you want?
My name is Cowslip. I come from a warren just across the field here.
translation.ko: 난 카우슬립이야 이 들판 너머 토끼 마을에 살지

translation.en: I don't want anything from you.
translation.ko: 너희에게 원하는 건 없어 피곤해 보이는데 먼 길을 왔니?

translation.en: -You look tired. Have you come a long way? -So what if we have?
translation.ko: 너희에게 원하는 건 없어 피곤해 보이는데 먼 길을 왔니? 그랬다면? 그래도 너 하나 상대할 힘은 있어

translation.en: That doesn't mean we can't defend ourselves.
translation.ko: 그랬다면? 그래도 너 하나 상대할 힘은 있어

translation.en: I don't doubt that for one second. Our warren's not as big as we'd like,
translation.ko: 물론 그렇겠지 우리가 바라는 만큼 마을이 크진 않지만 음식은 충분해

translation.en: but there's enough food to go around.
translation.ko: 우리가 바라는 만큼 마을이 크진 않지만 음식은 충분해

translation.en: And if you'd like to live with us, we'd welcome you.
These scrapes don't look too comfortable. There's more heavy storms on their way.
translation.ko: 너희가 있는 굴은 편해 보이지 않고 폭풍우가 또 오고 있어

translation.en: Anyway, if you'll excuse me. I hate the rain.
translation.ko: 그럼 이만 가볼게 난 비가 싫거든

translation.en: Well, that was unexpected.
Uh, we're going, right?
He seemed nice. I liked him. Let's go. Let's go right now.
translation.ko: 친절해 보여서 맘에 들었어 당장 가자

translation.en: But why did he invite us there? It makes no sense to share with us.
translation.ko: 하지만 우릴 왜 초대한 걸까? 음식을 나누다니 말이 안 돼

translation.en: -I've got a feeling-- -Here we go.
I've got a feeling we should have nothing to do with that rabbit or his warren,
translation.ko: 저 토끼나 그 마을과 엮여선 안 된다는 느낌이 들어

translation.en: that we ought to leave this place at once and head to the down.
translation.ko: 즉시 이곳을 떠나 워터십 다운으로 가야 해

translation.en: -What do you think, Hazel? -Yeah. We all know what Hazel thinks.
translation.ko: - 네 생각은, 헤이즐? - 뭘 물어봐 헤이즐 생각이야 뻔하지 파이버랑 똑같을 거야

translation.en: [mocks] He thinks the same as Fiver!
translation.ko: 헤이즐 생각이야 뻔하지 파이버랑 똑같을 거야

translation.en: I think we should go to Cowslip's warren.
These scrapes are no good in this weather
translation.ko: 궂은 날씨에 이런 굴은 소용없고 따뜻한 곳에서 잘 수 있다면

translation.en: and I fancy taking the chance to get warm and have some sleep.
translation.ko: 궂은 날씨에 이런 굴은 소용없고 따뜻한 곳에서 잘 수 있다면 가는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: [Bigwig] Sky above us. Every living creature for miles must know that's there!
translation.ko: 세상에 주변의 모든 동물이 저기 토끼 마을이 있는 걸 알겠군

translation.en: Everyone, keep your wits about you.
Friends...
We're glad you've come.
Allow me to take you down...
to the Great Burrow.
-[gasping and muttering] -Look at that...
[Blackberry] Look at the roof! The roots of the tree keep it stable. It's genius!
translation.ko: 천장 좀 봐! 나무뿌리 때문에 안 무너지네 천재적이야

translation.en: Clever rabbits!
[Hawkbit] Look at the size of them! They could rip us to pieces!
translation.ko: 몸집이 엄청나 우린 상대도 안 되겠어

translation.en: Hazel, may I be the first to welcome you all to our warren?
translation.ko: 헤이즐, 우리 마을에 온 너희를 내가 제일 먼저 환영해도 될까?

translation.en: Thank you. We're glad to be here.
This is a fine warren you have.
When you said it wasn't as big as you'd like,
we were expecting something a lot smaller. Were there more of you living here once?
translation.ko: 훨씬 작은 마을을 생각했거든 한때는 토끼가 더 많이 살았어?

translation.en: Why don't you just settle in here?
I think you'll find there's everything you'll ever need.
translation.ko: 너희에게 필요한 건 전부 있을 거야

translation.en: I've got a bad feeling, Hazel. Why are all the rabbits here so big?
translation.ko: 느낌이 안 좋아, 형 왜 이곳의 토끼는 전부 크지?

translation.en: [Hazel] Fiver, it's just for one night.
-It'll be okay. -Hello, you must be Hazel.
My name's Strawberry! I'm so excited to make friends with you.
translation.ko: 난 스트로베리야 네가 와서 정말 신나 친구가 될 생각에도 신나고

translation.en: Unless you don't want to be friends. It's fine if you don't.
We can be friends.
Oh! Brambles! I knew we'd get on! Come on! I'll take you a tour of the warren.
translation.ko: 나무딸기처럼 좋군! 이럴 줄 알았어 마을 구경을 시켜 줄게 내가 안내를 잘하거든

translation.en: I'm pretty good at tours, by the way.
translation.ko: 마을 구경을 시켜 줄게 내가 안내를 잘하거든

translation.en: Uh, we'd love to.
There are so many empty burrows, plenty of room for you all.
translation.ko: 빈 굴이 많아서 너희 모두 머물기에 충분해

translation.en: I'll find you a burrow close to mine, so if you've got any questions,
translation.ko: 내 굴 근처에 굴을 찾아 줄게 질문이 있으면

translation.en: you can come and say, Strawberry...
-Why are there so many empty burrows? -I don't know.
translation.ko: 왜 빈 굴이 많지? 글쎄 점액종증이 돌았을지도 모르지

translation.en: -Perhaps they had the white blindness. -[Strawberry chatters on]
translation.ko: 글쎄 점액종증이 돌았을지도 모르지 우리 집에선 친구나 가족이나 마찬가지야

translation.en: -[sniffs] -[Strawberry chatters]
Can't smell any signs of the disease.
[Strawberry] Here we are. Newcomers don't usually come here,
translation.ko: 다 왔어 처음 온 토끼들은 여기까진 안 데려오지만

translation.en: but since we're officially best friends, I'm going to make an exception.
[Strawberry] Enchanting, isn't it?
A rabbit called Laburnum did it.
We call it a shape.
It's where we come to give praise to Frith.
But what... what's it for?
Careful! We don't want to damage it. We're so blessed to have it.
translation.ko: 조심해! 부서지면 안 돼 우린 이걸 가져서 축복받은 거야

translation.en: It's such a special place to come to, especially when you're feeling sad.
translation.ko: 여긴 아주 특별한 곳이야 특히 슬플 때 오면 좋아

translation.en: What do you make of all this, Fiver? Fiver?
[Strawberry] Kingcup!
Kingcup, come and meet Hazel.
Oh, I didn't realise.
He's gone.
It's getting late. Let's find a place for you all to sleep!
translation.ko: 시간이 늦었어 다들 잘 곳을 찾아가자

translation.en: -Hazel! -Ah! What... What's going on?
translation.ko: 헤이즐 - 무슨 일이야? - 아무 일 없어, 바보!

translation.en: Nothing, silly goose! Come on. We need to get some flayrah. [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이야? - 아무 일 없어, 바보! 플레이라를 좀 먹으러 가자

translation.en: Flayrah! It's far too early to go raiding gardens for lettuce.
translation.ko: 플레이라? 밭을 습격해 양상추를 구하기엔 너무 이르잖아

translation.en: Frith in a basket! Flayrah!
Try it. It's a carrot.
Well?
How is it?
[mouth full] Horrible. Uh-uh. I wouldn't bother. I wouldn't bother... Oh!
-[chuckling] -[Hawkbit] Oh, yes.
so juicy.
-[grunting] -This is delicious.
Oh, I'm in heaven.
This place is better than heaven.
-This place has carrots! -[Hawkbit] Oh, yeah.
translation.ko: 천국보다 낫지 여긴 당근이 있잖아 맞아

translation.en: Oh. Oh, yeah.
[Hawkbit] Mm. Oh. Oh. Take it away from me. No, leave it here.
translation.ko: 이제 저리 치워 아냐, 그냥 놔둬

translation.en: You need to get control of Fiver.
This place is perfect. We don't want the rabbits here thinking
translation.ko: 이곳은 완벽해 파이버 때문에 이곳 토끼들이

translation.en: we don't appreciate their hospitality because of him, all right?
translation.ko: 우리가 호의를 무시한다고 생각하면 안 되니까

translation.en: I'll talk to him.
Oh, Fiver, have you been out here all night in the rain?
translation.ko: 파이버, 비도 오는데 밤새 여기에 있었어?

translation.en: Why don't you eat some of the flayrah?
Eating food that's been left by men? No, I'll have nothing to do with it.
translation.ko: 인간이 놓고 간 음식을 먹으라고? 난 그런 일 안 해

translation.en: -Are you trying to make me angry? -I'm the one who should be angry.
translation.ko: - 날 화나게 하려는 거야? - 화낼 토끼는 나야

translation.en: These rabbits... there's something about them that's sad and lost,
translation.ko: 이곳의 토끼들은... 어딘가 슬프고 상실감이 느껴져

translation.en: like trees in November. I've got a feeling that there's something--
What proof have we got that your feelings have ever been right?
translation.ko: 지금껏 네 느낌이 맞았다는 증거가 있어?

translation.en: Why didn't you have a feeling about the birds?
translation.ko: 왜 새들이 공격하는 건 못 느꼈지?

translation.en: Maybe the truth is there never was anything bad back at the old warren!
translation.ko: 예전 마을에 나쁜 일이 없었을지도 몰라

translation.en: Maybe we left everything behind because of you for no reason!
translation.ko: 너 때문에 아무 이유 없이 그곳을 떠난 걸지도!

translation.en: Maybe I left Dewdrop for no reason! [exhales]
translation.ko: 난 이유 없이 듀드롭을 잃은 걸지도 몰라!

translation.en: Dewdrop was the one who told the Owsla we were leaving!
-Hazel, I heard her telling Captain Holly. -[exhales] No, I don't believe you.
translation.ko: - 홀리 대장한테 말하는 걸 들었어 - 아니, 네 말 안 믿어

translation.en: -Hazel, you know I wouldn't make this up. -Go back into that warren,
translation.ko: 형, 내가 거짓말 안 하는 거 알잖아 저 마을로 돌아가 아니면 내가 직접 끌고 가지

translation.en: or I will drag you in there myself.
translation.ko: 저 마을로 돌아가 아니면 내가 직접 끌고 가지

translation.en: -No, Hazel, I won't. I won't go back! -Go!
translation.ko: - 형, 난 안 돌아갈 거야 - 가 버려!

translation.en: Hazel, I have to say, this place, it's paradise.
I've got my own burrow. There's a lot of very nice does here, let me tell you,
translation.ko: 내 굴도 있고 예쁜 암토끼도 많아

translation.en: and the food... no wonder these scoundrels are so fat!
translation.ko: 음식은... 이 녀석들이 왜 이렇게 뚱뚱한지 알겠어

translation.en: And I just... I don't know. I just wanted to say that...
I was wrong about you.
I'll follow you anywhere.
-To Hazel. -To Hazel.
-Hazel-rah! -Hazel-rah!
Hazel-rah! Huh! Frith's beard.
You did well. Don't let it go to your head.
translation.ko: 잘했어, 헤이즐 - 너무 우쭐대지는 마 - 모두 주목해

translation.en: Everyone! Everyone!
translation.ko: - 너무 우쭐대지는 마 - 모두 주목해 다들 주목, 손님들을 환영하는 의미로 이야기를 듣자

translation.en: I thought we might welcome our new guests by hearing some stories.
translation.ko: 다들 주목, 손님들을 환영하는 의미로 이야기를 듣자

translation.en: Yes, we have a wonderful storyteller amongst our number... Bluebell.
translation.ko: 좋지, 우리 중에 멋진 이야기꾼이 있는데 블루벨이야

translation.en: Did you just give me a compliment, Blackberry?
-I didn't think you liked me! -I didn't say I liked you...
translation.ko: - 날 싫어하는 줄 알았는데 - 좋아한다고는 안 했어 - 그냥 훌륭한 이야기꾼이라 했지 - 넌...

translation.en: -What...? -From this moment on, we're inseparable!
translation.ko: - 그냥 훌륭한 이야기꾼이라 했지 - 넌... 이 순간부터 우린 한 몸이야!

translation.en: Does and bucks, and kits up passed their burrow-times,
translation.ko: 암토끼와 수토끼 여러분 잘 시간에 깨어 있는 새끼 토끼들

translation.en: I give you the story of El-Ahrairah and the king's lettuce.
translation.ko: 엘-아흐레라와 왕의 양상추 얘기를 해 드리죠

translation.en: -[distant chanting] -There was a time when El-Ahrairah and his followers lost all their luck.
translation.ko: 엘-아흐레라와 그의 추종자들이 불운하게 살았던 적이 있었습니다

translation.en: Their enemies drove them out and they were forced to live
translation.ko: 적들이 토끼 족을 내쫓아 어쩔 수 없이

translation.en: down in the marshes of Kelfazin. Now, where the marshes...
[all chant] Devoted are we to the path he decides.
Praise be to Frith for our food.
translation.ko: 우리에게 음식을 주시는 프리스 님을 찬양합니다

translation.en: Blessed are we to be his humble servants.
translation.ko: 우린 축복 받아 그분의 미천한 종이 됐습니다

translation.en: Wise are we to accept his will.
Devoted are we to the path....
[Bluebell] And from that day to this,
no power on earth can keep a rabbit out of a vegetable garden
translation.ko: 세상의 어떤 권력도 토끼가 채소밭에 들어가는 걸 막지 못하죠

translation.en: for El-Ahrairah prompts them with 1,000 tricks!
translation.ko: 엘-아흐레라가 세계 최고인 천 개의 묘책으로

translation.en: -The best in the world! -[cheering]
translation.ko: 토끼들을 이끄니까요 - 세계 최고의 묘책! - 좋았어, 블루벨

translation.en: -The best in the world! -Nice one, Bluebell.
That was very nice. We don't tell the old stories much.
translation.ko: 아주 멋졌어 우린 옛날이야기를 별로 안 해

translation.en: El-Ahrairah doesn't mean much to us.
But he was a trickster! Rabbits always need tricks.
translation.ko: 하지만 묘책가잖아! 토끼는 항상 묘책이 필요해

translation.en: No, rabbits need dignity
and the will to accept what Frith has decided for them.
translation.ko: 그리고 프리스 님이 정한 운명을 받아들이는 의지가 필요해

translation.en: [chanting] Devoted are we to the path he decides.
Frith lies in the evening sky.
translation.ko: 프리스 님이 저녁 하늘에 몸을 누이십니다

translation.en: The clouds are red about him.
I am here, Lord Frith.
I am running through the long grass.
Oh, take me with you.
-[whimpers] -Dropping behind the woods, far away, to the heart of the light.
The silence.
For I am ready to give you my breath, my life.
translation.ko: 전 당신께 제 숨과 제 삶을 바칠 준비가 됐으니까요

translation.en: This rabbit, he... he smells like wounds.
-Like pain and rot. -[Silverweed] ...yellow and brown.
translation.ko: 고통의 냄새야 썩어가는 냄새라고 노랗고 갈색인 나뭇잎

translation.en: [Fiver] Hazel! Hazel, the roof!
translation.ko: 헤이즐 헤이즐, 이곳 천장은 뼈로 만들어졌어

translation.en: The roof here is made of bones!
They're not bones, Hrairoo. They're tree roots... [echoes]
translation.ko: 뼈가 아니야, 흐레이루 나무뿌리야 뼈가 아니라고...

translation.en: They're not bones...
Far away... into the earth, we go!
[Silverweed] Ready, with the berries.
-Stay here, Bigwig. I'll deal with this. -Don't tell me what to do.
translation.ko: - 내가 갈 테니 여기 있어, 빅윅 - 명령하지 마, 헤이즐

translation.en: You had your chance to deal with Fiver. Now it's my turn.
translation.ko: 파이버가 네 말을 안 들으니 - 이제 내 차례야 - 저도 함께 가겠습니다

translation.en: I will go with you. I will be rabbit of the leaves, in the deep...
translation.ko: - 이제 내 차례야 - 저도 함께 가겠습니다 나뭇잎의 토끼가 되겠습니다

translation.en: Fiver! You wretched little black beetle!
You're one tantrum away from getting us all kicked out!
translation.ko: 네가 한 번만 더 성질을 부리면 우린 전부 쫓겨나!

translation.en: [pants] I'm sorry, but I'm going to the down.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 난 워터십 다운으로 가야 해

translation.en: You wouldn't have a hope in hell! You'd be dead before night-Frith.
translation.ko: 가망 없어! 달이 뜨기도 전에 죽을 거야!

translation.en: You are closer to death than I, Bigwig. This place is death.
translation.ko: 나보다 네가 더 죽음과 가까워 이곳은 죽음 그 자체야

translation.en: There is shadow in every corner of it.
Hazel, you said that you could never make a good leader
because you're not the fastest, nor the strongest nor the smartest,
translation.ko: 가장 빠르지도, 힘이 세지도 똑똑하지도 않다면서

translation.en: but what makes a great leader is that you believed in us...
translation.ko: 하지만 형은 훌륭한 리더야 우릴 믿고

translation.en: and brought out the best in us.
Goodbye, brother.
Fiver, wait!
If you say this place is rotten, then it's rotten and we leave.
translation.ko: 네가 이곳이 썩었다면 썩은 거겠지, 떠나자

translation.en: We began this adventure together, we'll finish it together.
translation.ko: 이 모험을 함께 시작했으니 함께 끝낼 거야

translation.en: I'll go and tell the others we need to leave.
I'm not letting you get to the others, Hazel.
If you want to leave, go. The rest of us are staying here.
translation.ko: 떠나고 싶으면 둘이서만 떠나 우린 남을 거야

translation.en: -Let me go, Bigwig. -You're not Chief Rabbit, Hazel!
translation.ko: 이거 놔, 빅윅 넌 족장 토끼가 아니야 앞으로도 못 될 거고!

translation.en: You never will be! If you want to take the crazy dream of your brother
translation.ko: 넌 족장 토끼가 아니야 앞으로도 못 될 거고! 네 동생의 미친 꿈을 현실로 받아들이고 싶으면

translation.en: as reality, then do it elsewhere!
translation.ko: 네 동생의 미친 꿈을 현실로 받아들이고 싶으면 다른 곳에서 그렇게 해 넌 여기서 끝이야!

translation.en: You're finished here!
translation.ko: 다른 곳에서 그렇게 해 넌 여기서 끝이야!

translation.en: I'm going back to the warren now.
If you follow me there, I'll kill you both.
translation.ko: 날 따라오면 둘 다 죽여 버리겠어

translation.en: -[groans] -Hazel, something's got him.
Oh! Thlayli?
-Thlayli! Listen! You're in a snare. -[gasps for breath]
translation.ko: 쓸라일리! 잘 들어, 넌 덫에 걸렸어

translation.en: Now, what did they teach you to do in the Owsla?
translation.ko: 아우슬라에서 이럴 때 어떻게 하라고 했지?

translation.en: Bigwig, tell me what to do! Fiver, get the others.
translation.ko: 빅윅! 방법을 말해 줘! - 파이버, 다른 토끼들 불러와 - 갉아!

translation.en: Dig, bite. [gasps for breath]
-Bigwig's in a snare! Come quick! -[gasping]
Nobody leaves. Frith has decided that it is Bigwig's turn.
translation.ko: 아무도 못 나가, 프리스 님이 이번엔 빅윅 차례라고 정하셨어

translation.en: -And so it will be. -Turn! What do you mean turn?
translation.ko: 그러니 받아들여야 해 차례? 무슨 소리야?

translation.en: A day less for one means a day more for us all.
translation.ko: 한 토끼가 하루 덜 살면 나머지가 하루 더 살아

translation.en: -[chant] A day more for all. -Now, listen here. For the last few days,
translation.ko: - 모두 하루 더 살지 - 잘 들어 지난 며칠간 우린 쫓기고 발톱에 할퀴고 물리고 물에 빠졌어

translation.en: me and my friends have been chased, clawed, bitten, drowned
translation.ko: 지난 며칠간 우린 쫓기고 발톱에 할퀴고 물리고 물에 빠졌어

translation.en: and if you don't get out of the way now--
You'll find out why we've made it this far.
Let them leave, Cowslip!
Out of our way!
Fools! Think you're any safer out there than you are here?
translation.ko: 여기보다 밖이 안전하다고 생각하면 멍청한 거지!

translation.en: You'll be dead by sunset.
translation.ko: 해 질 녘쯤엔 다들 죽을 거다

translation.en: -Hazel, is he alive? -I don't know. He told me to dig and bite.
translation.ko: - 헤이즐, 빅윅이 살아 있어? - 몰라, 파고 갉으라고 했어

translation.en: -Bigwig? Oh, no. -[chokes]
-[Hazel] Hold on. Hold on. -[grunts]
It's narrower down there. We can bite through.
-Hurry. -Fiver, come on. You're the smallest.
-Quickly, brother. Come on, Fiver. -Come on!
-There has to be something else we can do. -[groans]
Bigwig, you hold on! You hold on!
-Come on! -Hold on, Bigwig.
translation.ko: - 조금만 참아, 빅윅 - 할 수 있어, 파이버

translation.en: [Hazel] Hurry, you can do it, Fiver! Quickly, brother!
translation.ko: - 조금만 참아, 빅윅 - 할 수 있어, 파이버 - 빨리 갉아 봐 - 소용없어

translation.en: -[gags] -[Hazel] Bigwig, stop!
translation.ko: - 빨리 갉아 봐 - 소용없어 빅윅, 멈춰!

translation.en: -Push this thing. -[grunts]
-[grunting] -[Blackberry] It's getting tighter.
-Bigwig, stop pulling. -[Hazel] He's almost there.
translation.ko: 점점 팽팽해져 빅윅, 그만 당겨 거의 됐어

translation.en: Bigwig! Bigwig!
[pants] It's out. You're free.
I can't hear him breathing.
[all] My heart has joined the thousand, for my friend stopped running today.
translation.ko: 내 친구가 오늘 달리기를 멈췄으니 내 마음을 감당할 수 없노라

translation.en: Fiver, clean your face now. The smell of blood will attract elil.
translation.ko: 파이버, 얼굴 좀 닦아 피 냄새 때문에 엘릴이 몰려오겠어

translation.en: -Mm. -Where are the other rabbits?
-They tried to stop us coming to help. -They what?
Cowslip said it was Frith's will.
translation.ko: 카우슬립 말이 이건 프리스 님의 의지래

translation.en: That a day less for one means a day more for everyone else.
translation.ko: 한 토끼가 하루 덜 살면 나머지가 하루 더 산다면서

translation.en: -Uh, Bigwig? -[grunts]
Oh, Bigwig, you're all right!
I thought I'd lost you, brother.
translation.ko: 널 잃는 줄 알았잖아, 형제 걸을 수 있겠어?

translation.en: -Do you think you can walk? -I can try.
translation.ko: 널 잃는 줄 알았잖아, 형제 걸을 수 있겠어? 해 볼게

translation.en: The man who set this snare's going to be back soon. Let's go.
translation.ko: 이 덫을 설치한 인간이 금방 올 거야, 가자

translation.en: -[twig snaps] -Shh, shh, who's that?
You've a nerve coming here.
Please, I didn't know Cowslip would try and stop you.
I'd like to come with you, if you'd have me.
translation.ko: 너희와 같이 가고 싶어 - 날 받아준다면 - 왜 우리가 그래야 하지?

translation.en: And why should we? Why don't you go back to all your friends in there?
translation.ko: - 날 받아준다면 - 왜 우리가 그래야 하지? 저기 있는 네 친구들에게 돌아가

translation.en: I don't... I don't have any friends.
People don't like to make friends here in case they get...
translation.ko: 이곳 토끼들은 친구를 안 만들어 혹시 덫에...

translation.en: You can come, Strawberry, but it's our ways.
translation.ko: 같이 간다면 우리 방식에 따라야 해

translation.en: If we say hop, you hop. Understood?
Now what? Where do we go from here?
We should go back and kill Cowslip! We should kill the lot of them!
translation.ko: 돌아가서 카우슬립을 죽여야 해 저들을 죽여야 해

translation.en: No, Bigwig. There's no need to go and fight them.
translation.ko: 아니, 빅윅 돌아가서 싸울 필요 없어

translation.en: -All we have to do is to leave them there. -[coughs]
The down that you saw, you... you really had a feeling about that?
translation.ko: 네가 봤던 워터십 다운... 정말 느낌이 왔어?

translation.en: Yes, I did, Bigwig. That down is our home.
translation.ko: 맞아, 빅윅 그곳이 우리가 살 곳이야

translation.en: [pants] We made it.
There's great views all around.
We'll be able to see any elil coming from miles away.
translation.ko: 먼 곳에서 다가오는 엘릴도 전부 보이겠어

translation.en: Well done, Hazel-rah.
[Blackberry] In terms of digging a warren, we'll investigate
translation.ko: 토끼 굴을 파려면 흙이 어떤지 조사하고

translation.en: what type of soil we're dealing with and make a more comprehensive...
translation.ko: 흙이 어떤지 조사하고 좀 더 포괄적으로...

translation.en: Stop trying to kiss me! That is not a thing we do! Bluebell!
translation.ko: 나한테 뽀뽀 좀 그만해! 우린 이런 거 안 해, 블루벨!

translation.en: [Holly] Zorn.
Oh, Zorn.
Zorn! [inhales sharply]
Captain Holly?
-[Blackberry] What's happened to him? -[groans]
Sandleford... it's gone.
It's all gone! [breathes heavily]
Fiver... you were right about everything!
[inhales and groans] You knew the story before it was even told.
translation.ko: 넌 어떻게 될지 미리 알았던 거였어

translation.en: There's something else.
You're not safe here.
[groans] No one is safe!
Sir, the wide patrol picked up the scent of a large band of rabbits near the down.
translation.ko: 장군님 정찰대가 언덕 근처에서 한 무리의 토끼 냄새를 맡았습니다

translation.en: Unfortunately, sir, they lost them.
Tell them not to return until they're located.
translation.ko: 그놈들을 찾기 전엔 돌아오지 말라고 전해라

translation.en: Leave one alive for questioning.
